name: Rapidless
description:
Choose from 5 different cars with different handling, max speed and acceleration. This is a racing game kind of  like Wipeout and was made in 24hrs for epic game jam 4.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to drive. 

Space Bar to look behind

Note: The "Play Again" button doesn't work properly, if you want to race again restart the game.
